ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Lev 51 Selos got me killed!
ygData.msgSnippet: it almost got me killed for the same reasons in Burning Woods.  this song is not for fighting and definitely NOT for escape, especially against casters. every
ygData.messageBody:
it almost got me killed for the same reasons in Burning Woods. this song is
not for fighting and definitely NOT for escape, especially against casters.
every time i would finally get it to pulse, blam i get hit by a spell and it
falls, because of the invisibility effect. for this same reason, niv's
melody and nillipus' march drop because they have a rune effect. as soon as
it's exceeded (which is one hit from these mobs) the whole effect drops.

Shada Powa, L53 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Last night, I was tracking and pulling in Trakanons. At first
> was using my Selos drum and out running the mobs thus losing
> them. So I switched to weps and was slow enough but noticed something.
>
> When you get attacked or attack something, while playing SSoT
> (song of travel), the effect drops immediately. And you have
> to re-key it to get going again. It looks like it will be
> un-workable for fighting mobs if it drops as soon as you key
> anything else.
